rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0001
rows.name:
How about a quick tour of the facilities
to refresh your memory?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0002
rows.name: Let's start with your living quarters. Follow me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0003
rows.name:
Brave citizens of New Los Angeles: Good day.
This is your director general, Maurice Chausson.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0004
rows.name:
Today, I once again come to you with news
I am truly delighted to share:[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0005
rows.name:
Yesterday, we repatriated
10 more White Whale crew members.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0006
rows.name:
These fellow pioneers will rejoin our ranks as citizens
of NLA, bringing with them skills and know-how[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0007
rows.name:
that will bolster our ability to survive—
and indeed flourish—here in our new home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0008
rows.name: This, of course,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0009
rows.name: is only the latest success in our continuing efforts—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0013
rows.name: "Director general"? Since when?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0014
rows.name: Two days ago, ma'am.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0015
rows.name:
From "political aide" to "director general"
in just a few weeks...[ST:page p1=90 ]At this rate, he'll be "emperor" by next month.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0016
rows.name: Irina. Gwin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0017
rows.name: Nice work out there, ma'am.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_JNK0010
rows.name: Show Interest

rows.label: xs01010100_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask who these two people are.

rows.label: xs01010100_JNK0020
rows.name: Look Puzzled

rows.label: xs01010100_SEL0021
rows.name: Wonder why they call Elma "ma'am".

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0018
rows.name: Right, introductions: Irina Akulov. Gwin Evans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0019_m
rows.name: This one of the survivors, Colonel?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0019_f
rows.name: This one of the survivors, Colonel?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0020_m
rows.name:
THE survivor.
I only found a single pod intact at Starfall Basin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0020_f
rows.name:
THE survivor.
I only found a single pod intact at Starfall Basin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0021
rows.name:
Wait, what?!
What happened to "10 more crew members"?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0022
rows.name:
Come on, seriously? Chausson was never one
to let the truth get in the way of a good speech.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0023
rows.name: Still, every last survivor counts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0024
rows.name: You can call me Irina. I'm with the Interceptors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0025
rows.name: Me too, same division. You can call me "Mr. Evans."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0026
rows.name: ...Or just "Gwin."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0027
rows.name:
The three of us were in the Coalition forces together—[ST:page p1=90 ]specifically, the Special Operations
Heavy Armor Training Unit...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0028
rows.name: aka the "Skelleton Crew."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0029
rows.name:
I was a colonel and Irina a lieutenant—
Gwin was a more recent recruit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0030
rows.name:
Course, I keep telling them we don't need
those old ranks anymore now that we're here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0031
rows.name:
You're still "colonel" to me, ma'am.
No reorg will ever change that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0032
rows.name:
And that's not about chain of command, either.
It's about respect. You've earned it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0033
rows.name: And the award for best ass-kiss goes to...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0034
rows.name:
Well, I'd remind you both the "ma'am"s
aren't necessary if I thought you'd listen...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0035
rows.name:
The three of us were in the Coalition forces together—[ST:page p1=90 ]specifically, the Special Operations
Heavy Armor Training Unit...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0036
rows.name: aka the "Skelleton Crew."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0037
rows.name:
I was a colonel and Irina a lieutenant—
Gwin was a more recent recruit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0038
rows.name:
Course, I keep telling them we don't need
those old ranks anymore now that we're here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0039
rows.name:
You're still "colonel" to me, ma'am.
No reorg will ever change that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0040
rows.name:
And that's not about chain of command, either.
It's about respect. You've earned it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0041
rows.name: And the award for best ass-kiss goes to...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0042
rows.name:
Well, I'd remind you both the "ma'am"s
aren't necessary if I thought you'd listen...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0043_m
rows.name: This one of the survivors, ma'am?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0043_f
rows.name: This one of the survivors, ma'am?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0044_m
rows.name:
THE survivor.
I only found a single pod intact at Starfall Basin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0044_f
rows.name:
THE survivor.
I only found a single pod intact at Starfall Basin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0045
rows.name:
Wait, what?!
What happened to "10 more crew members"?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0046
rows.name:
Come on, seriously? Chausson was never one
to let the truth get in the way of a good speech.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0047
rows.name: Still, every last survivor counts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0048
rows.name: You can call me Irina. I'm with the Interceptors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0049
rows.name: Me too, same division. You can call me "Mr. Evans."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0050
rows.name: ...Or just "Gwin."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0051
rows.name:
All right, ma'am—we should be getting back to work.
Until next time, Colonel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0052
rows.name:
Right—we should be going, too.[ST:page p1=60 ]The administrative district isn't far.
That's where you'll be calling home—for now, anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0033_2
rows.name: [ST:space ]
